name: Happy Numbers
description: Happy Numbers is a relaxing, mind-blending, minimalist puzzle game that offer over 70 hand-crafted levels to immerse your self into. The game also constain a lot of beautiful characters to unlock.

name: Bridg
description: Bridge walking simulator

name: Raketenwashmachine
description: RAKETENWASCHMACHINE is an action-puzzle game set in a constantly spinning world that will melt your brain

name: Project:Pong
description: The Pong game is very simple, but what if there were two balls? What if there was fire in the middle? What if the whole field was frozen? What if there was a snake? A cannon? Ghosts? Bats? Wind? Water? Portals? This is the kind of ideas that inspired me in creating Project:Pong.

name: Belling Coins
description: Classic maze puzzle mechanics in a new game! Beautiful graphics and interesting gameplay are waiting for you in "Belling Coins".

name: Pulse Jumper
description: Pulse Jumper is a Precision-Platformer where you can jump with guns!

name: Gran Empire
description: Save the kingdom in crisis, and aim for the hearts of the leaders of the great powers!

name: Knights of Grumthorr
description: Real-time strategy and tactics in a fantasy world of knights and magic! Command heroes, soldiers and mages to battle against the armies of darkness. Grumthorr needs you!

name: Existensis
description: Explore the world of Eré for artistic inspiration, so that you may reach the meanings of life and complete your artistic opus! Many branching paths will take you to every corner of the globe as you explore this peaceful and colorful world.

name: Haunted Nightmares
description: These nightmares are your personal labyrinth. A game that puts you into nightmares in which you are hunted by „shadows“.Find the hidden "Three Orbs of Beautiful Memories" and the escape... if you can.

name: Contact Me
description: This is highly difficult horror game. Please find one key, and playing. Don't be afraid , please be brave. Finally, hope you bravely a live

name: Tap-A-Zombie
description: Train your brain with "Tap-A-Zombie", the memory game for the not yet fully brain dead.

name: Mariuccha Alchemy Queen
description: Mariuccha is an old elven with a dark, tragic past, trying to make amends for her sins by opening an alchemy shop with the help of her ghost boyfriend Mr Testamentin.

name: Toy Tanks
description: Physics based competitive tank game.

name: Bunny Factory
description: Help bunny to set up factory production by restoring all control blocks. Solve 3D puzzles alone or with friends.

name: Avrod
description: A virtual reality archaeology free-to-play online social platform.

name: Airlock Arena
description: Deliver cargo through a brutally punishing gauntlet of deep space dangers in Airlock Arena. 1-4 players can cooperate to navigate the perils of both space and planets as they transport, protect, accumulate, and finally deliver all manner of valuable payload to their destinations.

name: Clean Slate
description: A suspense visual novel filled to the brim with life-or-death situations, puzzles and six different endings. Make your own decisions, solve riddles and reach the truth about the disapperance of the world's leading geneticist (and your best friend).

name: Puzzle Light
description: Swap the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

name: Divilixa
description: Divilixa is a game about strife, sacrifice and insanity. Take the war down into the core of the underworld. Fight the darkness. Be the saviour.

name: Road to Death
description: Shoot and loot your way through the dark while making it to extraction.

name: One Way: The Elevator
description: One Way: The Elevator is a creative point-and-click game developed by CottonGame. You need to find a blue sphere in each scene to power an elevator to travel upward.

name: Grilled
description: Grilled is an action arcade game which allows the player to eliminate in-game characters using a car. The physics-based, non-scripted interaction between vehicle, characters and environment is the perfect recipe for full in-game freedom!

name: Soliterix
description: Tired of the spider? Try a different way to play the solitaire! A mix between the classic and the well-known falling blocks game!

name: LX Patterns
description: How smart are you? The ability to recognize patterns is used to measure intelligence. LX patterns is a puzzle game in which you have to identify different patterns while listening to a relaxing soundtrack.

name: Rogue Invader
description: In Rogue Invader, YOU are the invader attacking the alien horde in this genre-flipping roguelite shooter. 1-Bit black and white old-school art style, with modern touches and HD graphics.

name: Matrix Blocks
description: Enter at Matrix Blocks, the most fun game for VR Cut the cubes at right sequence, color and follow the music beat Matrix will spin, slow down, goes up and down and more The Matrix always will arrange the blocks for you have the best fun!

name: Twinstick Arcade
description: Retro shooting, perfected. Blast and dash through in a gorgeous retro 2D world! Explore and fight your way out of the arcade machine!

name: Irongrave: Tactics
description: Irongrave: Tactics is a tactical turn-based strategy game of gladiatorial tournaments. Recruit a team of fighters, customize and train your team between rounds as you compete to be the last team standing - or end up just another set of bodies bleeding in the Irongrave.

name: Re-Nullum
description: Re-Nullum is a minimalist puzzle game about combining numbers. On each level, you must clear the board by connecting numbered tiles.

name: What's Inside??
description: A light-hearted comedic romance novel for all ages, starring three academic girls each with their own personalities and quirks.. Unravel a mystery in a contemporary, fantasy, apocalyptic and sci-fi setting... Can you save the human race from disaster?? Discover 'What's Inside??'

name: 孙美琪疑案 第三季
description: Sin descripción

name: Grandpurrents
description: Grandpurrents is a rogue-lite game with action-RPG elements where you must go out in search for your cats. The player will find themselves in multiple dungeons fighting unique enemies and bosses. Saving cats will let you use their power for your next adventure!

name: Unknown Planet
description: An open world survival game. You've crash landed on an alien planet. Build, craft, mine resources, fight the alien lifeforms and survive.

name: Drift Racing Rally
description: Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.

name: Anatidae
description: Anatidae is a precision platform game about a little duck with amazing skils. Your objective is catch the max golden eggs that you can! Do you have what it takes to go throug all the challenges?

name: Bitpunky
description: Bitpunky is a sandbox game of creating and developing your own digital civilization in the middle of a huge virtual space. Explore the outside world, use the resources of the virtual space for improving and automating processes within your futuristic city!

name: DoomBreaker
description: DoomBreaker is a hack n slash adventure in a procedurally generated world, accompanied with voice work driven narrative, combat system and more. Rise up and fight against the impending doom that's merging with your world, spreading evil.

name: Dark Around You
description: A dark pixelated platformer that immerses you in the world of a mysterious dungeon...

name: Ultikill
description: Ultikill is a free to play top down shooter. It has single player and multiplayer features. There are a plethora of weapons to take on the endless number of monsters as well as the other players you are up against.

name: Everest Search and Rescue
description: Answer emergency calls in Himalaya! Dispatch helicopters, rescue injured climbers, send sherpas to assist lost tourists, watch weather and guide expeditions safely through the highest mountains in the world! Manage your resources and race against time to answer as many calls for help as possible.

name: Lakeview Cabin 2
description: The ultimate 2D horror is back! Dive deep into the diverse world of horror movies! Nothing can prepare you for the R-rated challenges you will face!

name: Heart of Enya
description: A 2D narrative-focused strategic RPG with visual novel elements. You play as Willow Wisp, a campfire spirit who guides a group of amateur adventurers in harnessing the warm magic of self love to fend off the Frost that surrounds them.

name: Darkilson
description: Due to a terrible curse, the BA Bear was locked down in an asylum for meek and hairy bears. Help him get out of this not-so-delicious place!

name: Melrose Academy of the Arcane
description: Join other players from around the world in 25-minute work / 5-minute break sessions where everyone is focused on their own tasks. Make the castle a place where you can rest or join others to be more productive rid of any distractions. Find a spot, set your goals, and enjoy the atmosphere.

name: Chiasm
description: Chiasm blends mind-bending time puzzles with a unique, pensive aesthetic. Learn how to work when time is flowing backwards.

name: Bubbaruka!
description: A horror puzzle simulator about exploring an abandoned children's game, stalked by the the shambling husks of scrapped concepts that pursue you endlessly throughout the environment as you try to solve the cryptic puzzles left behind by the developers and keep your pet alive.

name: The First Confrontation
description: This is an FPS game with only one map, which is a test project for developers. Creative scenes! But playing is more common. You need to collect some materials to achieve your goal! It can't be your playmate for a long time, but it's a good start

name: Notebook Artillery
description: The classic game of Artillery with beautiful hand-drawn art. Play solo with Target Practice, or play against a friend in Vs. mode.

name: Block Motion
description: Block motion is a puzzle / design game where you place functional blocks to design a working factory. Build your design, press play and watch your factory in action. You have the freedom to solve the challenges any way you want; The only limit is your imagination.

name: Roadpunk
description: By speeding on the road to get money to buy luxury cars, set records on different roads.

name: Aliens Adventure
description: Aliens Adventure is a super classic adventure game with legendary side-scrolling arcade platformer. Jump and shoot your way to freedom as you search for your fellow Aliens and break free from captivity. Enjoy this brand new super adventure platformer game!

name: Sekrets of the Dungeon
description: Sekrets of the Dungeon - a 2D platformer in the genre of Dungeon Crawler, where you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, without stepping aside... And go home!

name: Escape: Underground
description: An atmospheric journey where the main protagonist is searching for a way out of the underground.

name: Tarek
description: Minimalistic platformer with fifteen game and three-in-a-row elements!

name: Dark Cards
description: "Dark Cards" is a card game where you battle opponents by building a deck. In this game you are a debt collector, and face a strange race in the universe and start a crazy adventure.

name: The Help Desk
description: Manage time, evade enemies and solve randomly generated tasks.

name: Trolley Simulator
description: Let's craft a new car! And make a hole-in-one in the black hole! Here is a new 2D car crafting game!

name: The Guardian
description: The Guardian is a 2D platformer with a lot of interesting levels! Many different obstacles and opponents will be in the game, and you must overcome them and get the Earth stone.

name: LolliPop: The Best Indie Game
description: LolliPop: The Best Indie Game - the best that could have been made by two indie developers that having no development experience, no time, no money or the desire to work and claws instead of hands.

name: Eden's Lair
description: Fight a variety of enemies inside intense high action arenas.

name: Recoiled
description: Join a friend in this free-to-play online multiplayer PvP game with insane 2D physics. Select from several unique game modes, such as Free-for-all, Racing mode, and Target mode. Note: both players must have a Steam account to play.

name: Cross Princess
description: Single route visual novel. Belle is actually a boy, an accident lets him and a bright girl named Bambi begin to live together, a warm and healing friendship + love story.

name: Poly Pirates
description: Build ye ship, battle ye enemies, and take the plunder! But beware, there be dangers in these waters...

name: Power of the Ancients
description: A peaceful pixely isometric city builder with strategy elements. Gather resources, build homes and create a thriving city while preparing for harvest as winter approaches.

name: Dwarf Slayer
description: A difficult game about tight movement and strategic play

name: Bountiful Life
description: Bountiful Life is a Farming & Life Simulator. You’ve been tasked with the responsibility of taking over an abandoned rinky-dink farm. Maintain a source of income, create wholesome relationships with your friends and family, and discover yourself within Jubilee Village.

name: Vikings: Age of the Axe
description: Vikings: Age of the Axe is a first person slasher with both singleplayer mode and online cooperation. Prepare to go on expeditions for blood and gold around the 10th century. Become a respected chief, plunder far lands and slay your enemies for the glory of the Norse gods.

name: Doge to the Moon
description: Doge to the Moon is an endless runner game based on the WSB and Dogecoin stock market saga. Help Doge as he rocks out to a great soundtrack flying through space while avoiding asteroids, comets, and other out of this world obstacles as you try to get Doge to the Moon and BEYOND! MUCH WOW, included.

name: Retrobound
description: "Indie Turn-Based RPG! Nostalgic Memories and Easter Eggs!

name: Space Mouse 2
description: In 1981, Geimu Kyoujin's masterpiece "Space Mouse" was released. 39 years later, a sequel has arrived. In "Space Mouse 2", you'll enter a perilous underground labyrinth. This is a roguelike dot-eater designed to appeal to players of all skill levels.

name: Traveler of Artcaster
description: Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the mystic world named "Artcaster". Your character explores a huge open world to find his/her father who was fighting for the king of Artcaster. But with this search a big journey with many friends and enemies begins.

name: Quest: Escape Room 3
description: The jolly party of Paul and his friends ends with a kidnapping. It turns out that they are locked in an abandoned factory by some maniac who decided to play a deadly game with them. Will they be able to solve all the riddles and escape from this dark place?

name: Kitty Tactics
description: A cute turn-based tactics game about growing stronger, making friends and conquering foes! Become a cat, expand your territory and reign supreme over your enemies through dynamic tactical combat!

name: Apolune 2
description: Apolune 2 allows one or multiple simultaneous players to experience the life of an asteroid miner in deep space. A tragic comedy set in outer space.

name: Music95
description: Music95 is a special music game. There is no premade beatmaps. Game content is automatically created by player's own music track. So player can immerse in their favorite music. Try it Out！

name: Landrocker
description: Explore, liberate, mine, and craft across unlimited planets. Sell equipment, share revenue, and earn passive income

name: Antumbra: Vile Shards
description: In a nutshell: Choose Your Own Adventure, Choices Matter, Text-based, Point & Click, Exploration, Multiple Endings and Interactive Fiction. Dark and surreal psychological horror. Strongly inspired by Lovecraft, H.R. Giger and Zdzisław Beksiński.

name: Last Mortem
description: Multiplayer FPS Game in the style of old-school browser shooters set up in the fictional Cold War battlefields! The game feature fast-paced FPS gameplay with online players or AI BOTs, a huge variety of weapons, unique maps, the progression system, and many more features!

name: Straya
description: An action based shooter based in Australia where everything wants to kill you.

name: Pandemia
description: Choose who lives and who dies in a small peripheral hospital in a pandemic situation.

name: Challenge Party
description: Challenge Party is a 2-4 player online party game. The purpose of the game is to compete with your friends in many minigames.

name: Zball II
description: Zball II is a new physics puzzle game. The goal is the same as in the first Zball game - you need to deliver the green ball to the green platform. It sounds simple, but actually it is not.

name: Pointy Ends
description: Pointy Ends is an accessible fast-paced PVP battle with up to 4 players. Go all out in free-for-all battles or join forces with a fellow knight in 2v2 battle mode. Missing players? Not to worry, noble bots will fill in.

name: Zombie Drift
description: Will you beat all levels and become the drift killer? Zombies are everywhere! Unfortunately, you don’t have any weapon. But you do have a car! Now show those zombies who is the boss and show your drifting skills!

name: Bygone Dreams
description: Bygone Dreams is a high fantasy Action-Adventure set inside a surreal dream world. Face fantastical adversaries, solve puzzles, and fight your way through challenging bosses in your quest to save the world's matron deity and stop the nightmare consuming the dream.

name: Horror Tales: The Beggar
description: Control space-time to fight an evil monster in this terror and science fiction journey set in a shattered but beautiful world. Bend physics, the sky and the earth itself in engaging boss-fight encounters with the full power of Unreal Engine 5 and Nvidia DLSS.

name: Grim Ember
description: An Epic RPG in which you set out on an action packed rogue-lite journey of turn-based strategic battles in a medieval fantasy world. Discover powerful spells and abilities as you journey forth to cleanse the lands plagued by unimaginable horrors and abominations.

name: Musical Balls
description: Physics based music maker.

name: Hell Loop
description: Hell Loop is a platformer tower defense where your goal is to kill sinners trying to escape from hell. Place automated traps and enjoy the bloodbath. It's like Lemmings, but your goal is to kill them all.

name: Sackgasse: The Last Resort
description: In a post-apocaliptic world, be the ultimate savior with only your gun and guts. Are you trustible enough to defend your Resort? If so, help Aya surviving hordes of enemies while uncover the truth, in this Survival Shooter Tower Defense Game! Things will gonna be wild... literally!

name: Insane Creations
description: Insane Creations is a physics-based puzzle game where the goal is to destroy the vase! Use the items allotted to you to build contraptions with the sole purpose of shattering the vase. Use your creativity to satisfy your need for destruction in Insane Creations.

name: Project Midgard
description: Playing solo or up to a squad of 4, defend the bunker as your scientist friends try to shut down Project Midgard. Build and upgrade defenses, go out in to the world to explore locations for loot and resources, find and repair old bunker defenses, do what you need to to survive.

name: Live Labyrinth
description: A living maze is drawn during its passage, and only at the end of the path do you understand what it wants to tell you

name: Something Strange in the Woods
description: Something Strange is happening in the Woods, different creatures appear endlessly, which upsets the balance. Can you maintain balance by freeing the forest from these creatures?

name: Flight Catastrophe
description: Flight Catastrophe gives you a unique opportunity to become a crisis management specialist aboard the passenger plane. You are the only one who can handle dangerous situations occurring during the flight! Command the crew, identify the threats, make difficult choices - many lives are on the line!

name: Temple of Hue
description: Temple of Hue is a 2D colour mixing puzzle game. Help the Jacklerats bring back colour to their dark world!

name: Adventure Light
description: Adventure Light is a dark adventure game about a young boy named Steve. He is compelled to find his best friend Adam and in his quest, he ventures onto the darkest paths of the mysterious forest.

name: Four Course Combat
description: An evil chef has cooked a four course meal and gave it life to help him conquer the world. Choose between 4 diverse characters and save the world!!!

name: Between them
description: In Between them you are an agent who gets different missions. You yourself have the decision how to complete the mission and therefore you have several options to choose from.

name: Hocus 2
description: Hocus continues; this time everything is dynamic. Hocus 2 has new mechanics and illusion combinations with so many creative solving possibilities. Featuring 85 hand-crafted creative levels so far and 9 different mechanics.

name: Tiny Defender
description: Tiny Defender is a game that combines CCG and tower defense. Build your own deck and clear various stages.

name: Rifle Strike
description: Scorestreaks, Weapons, Progression System, All for free! A First-Person shooter oriented towards fast-paced gameplay.

name: Parallax Tunnel
description: Parallax Tunnel is a first-person runner-style arcade game.

name: Rise of Mavros
description: Do you have what it takes to be the light and fight through the darkness? Use your combat skills and special abilities to knock down your enemies and progress through the levels. It is your duty to prevent the Rise of Mavros!

name: The Call Centre
description: Do you have what it takes to work at a call centre?

name: Kojouji
description: Kojouji is a sci-fi survival-horror puzle game that takes place in an abandoned factory.

name: Relax It's Aqua
description: Relax It's Aqua is an underwater hidden objects finding atmospheric experience. Each scene will be set in a different aquatic environment.

name: To My Best Friend
description: To My Best Friend is a first-person exploratory narrative experience delivering an emotional story. Made to be experienced in one sitting, it offers something you can return to, revisit, and think on whenever you feel like you need to remember the good times life has to offer.

name: 911 Operator: Special Resources
description:
The Special Resources DLC was released on the same days as the base game.

It offers new vehicles, new equipment and new incidents.

name: Kisekimura
description:
Kisekimura is a turn based RPG that features adult content and collaborations with NSFW content creators. Accompany diverse characters along their journeys in a vast fantasy world full of dangers, magic and interesting choices!

Kisekimura features a rich turn-based combat system that's combined with an idle gameplay that lets you farm in the background.

name: Star Squadron: Student Driver
description: A tongue-in-cheek space shooter where your only weapon is a ping pong cannon. Survive 15 levels and you might just earn your pilot's license.

name: Adventures of Megara: Demeter's Cat-astrophe
description: Help Megara get back Demeter’s grace ruined by hungry kitten

name: Lorcan the Leprechaun
description: Lorcan The Leprechaun is classic 3D Platforming greatness. Tight responsive controls, deep mechanics, and a vast number of incredible unique worlds to traverse. When the Pot of Gold is stolen from Clover Temple, Lorcan The Leprechaun is needed to save the day!

name: HPRZ: The Syndrome
description: HPRZ: The Syndrome is an online multiplayer survival, where the main challenge is to keep your character alive in an open world in 64 km. Scarcity of resources will make healthy, infected individuals fight for survival in a land without law.

name: Biolum
description: With voices of actresses Charlotte Rampling and Dominique Tipper, Biolum is a VR sci-fi experience which immerses you in the mysterious beauty of deep sea life, on a dive that takes a shocking turn for the worse.

name: GalaxySpace VR
description: Galaxy Space VR is a third-person VR shooting game. Avoid enemy attacks and shoot down enemies on all stages!

name: Dwarven Forge
description: Dwarven Forge is hardcore strategy. About crafting, enchanting and trading. Produce various good from padded vest and chainmail armor to epic weapons or precious jewels.

name: Liminalphobia
description: Travel through dark dingy apartments and cold stone basements. Stay away from the many creatures following you around every corner. Find collectibles and outlast the demons. walk this first-person horror experience through twisting mazes and search for keys. outlast the demons and find any way out.

name: Axe Girl
description: Axe Girl! The only video game starring a female lumberjack. (As far as we know) Slash your way through fierce foes in this awesome action platformer! Chop to it and kick some axe!

name: Sainthum
description: Do you like TPS games? Do you like zombie games? Are you too afraid to play zombie games? Now, you have an unmissable choice: [Sainthum]——a cartoon zombie TPS game. And, roar is DPS in the game.

name: Forest Liberation
description: The people that live in this mysterious forest need your help. They've been overrun by hostile rouges and are helpless without you. Will you be able to liberate them and drive the rogues off?

name: Bulorgus
description: Play as Gorgus as he uses his newfound alien fan to get back home. Bounce through dozens of unique and interconnected areas by using the recoil from hitting nearby objects! Gain crazy speed and find secret cats hidden throughout the world!

name: Primal Man Simulator
description: Primal Man Simulator is a complex survival simulator where the player becomes one of the evolutionary precursors of modern homo sapiens, trying to live through another day in an unwelcoming forests of Europe.

name: Blorks: The Quest for Magnesium
description: Blorks: The Quest for Magnesium is an intense bullet-hell shooter with psychedelic aesthetics reminiscent of late 90s console titles.

name: Jung's Labyrinth
description: Jung's Labyrinth is a psychological exploration game that uses Jungian psychology, mythology, alchemical and dream symbolism in a series of active imaginations to map the process of individuation. Confront your inner archetypes, collect messages that other travelers left behind and reach your Self.

name: Spot the Dot
description: A little game where you have to break objects at an ever increasing rate.

name: Microjob
description: Microjob is an interactive language learning game. It teaches words through objects / pictures, daily conversations with simple dialogues, and actions with tiny tasks. It's main purpose to give you courage about your first real life listening and speaking experience.

name: Gravels of Endless War
description: Gravels Of Endless War - new turn-based online strategy game. You don’t have to lvl up, grind or do quests. There are no ads or P2W elements. Build your own unique team, discover the special abilites and start your Endless War for the War Relics.

name: Ultimate Wall Defense Force
description: Ultimate Wall Defense Force is a single-player, action game made for VR. Fly into a superhero fantasy inspired by outrageous anime fights. Defend The Wall and destroy an onslaught of enemy Geodites by yielding ultimate abilities in the palms of your hands.

name: Wizardry Squared
description: Wizardry Squared is a 2d Physics-based Spell-crafting Platformer Shooter. You play a young wizard who must fight against a system for revenge and Wizardry Squared.

name: Next Earth: The Journey Trilogy
description: Arcade action meets puzzle adventure. Slow down and speed up space. Collect all the fuel cells. Then get to the exit while avoiding the Octians before the timer runs out.

name: Aldriak: The Advent of a New World
description: It's a RPG turn-based strategy game inspired by the first games of the genre but with a new and original mechanic. This mechanic takes the form of 3 distinct rows in which all the fighters are placed. Each skill requires being in a particular row and can only target by following certain rules.

name: Little Wolf
description: We play as Ulf, a little wolf, who must rescue his pack and other critters who have gotten lost and send them back to Halwend. There's something mysterious going on, Ulf needs to find out why this has happened to make Halwend safe again.

name: Samurai Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now with Samurai Warriors! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be a real Samurai.

name: The Perfect Tower II
description: The Perfect Tower II is a mix between an incremental and a tower defense game. Build a town and explore a variety of regions to unlock different mini-games and tons of upgrades.

name: A Cat in Dungeons
description: Save a cat from a dungeons going trough turnable tabletops, finding the safest path to the goal. Use teleports, mechanisms and your brain in puzzles carefully desgined.

name: Decks & Dungeons
description: A Turn based deck building Monster Collecting Roguelite RPG!

name: 2 Times Circles
description: 2 Times Circles is a game about controlling 2 circles moving horizontally and vertically in the two split screen at the same time.

name: The Girl Who Sees
description: The Girl Who Sees is a point-and-click adventure and turn-based RPG hybrid that explores WWII history and Philippine fantasy. In 1944, young Quina discovers the mythical realm as her village survives under Japanese occupation. Two game styles: turn-based battles or cultural trivia.

name: Dodge Dancer
description: Enjoy some sweet chiptunes while you dodge frantically about a 3x3 grid. Get a perfect score, and unlock added difficulty modifiers for an extra challenge. Keep Dodge Dude from getting hit 10 times, and he'll smile because you're good at the game.

name: The Alien Trials
description: The ultimate multiplayer extraterrestrial showdown. Pass the combat trial by pummeling, bashing, and mauling your foe in a dark, intense, immersive environment.

name: Salto
description: The best adventures happen as you dream: Jump from between high ledges and buildings to explore the world above the clouds! Single and Two-player local Coop.

name: Phoenix Point: Blood and Titanium
description: Expand the power and versatility of Phoenix Point operatives with cybernetic augmentations. Unlock new abilities for your soldiers, new research projects, and new approaches to tactical combat. But beware: enemies will bring cybernetics to bear against your team, too.

name: Matts Project Z Endless
description: 1-6 player co-op third & first-person shooter, Fight through Hordes of Zombies in this Wave Survival Shooter. Modern & Sci-Fi Weapons, hard and fun Difficulties, and unique various Locations to Explore! Featuring Original soundtracks by Ravesta Records.

name: White Wall
description: A sci-fi first-person RPG based on the global collapse of the human race. Play as Aaron, the young adult searching for answers in the barren wastes of the American west coast along with his AI companion MAX. Fight, shoot, loot your way through this total open-world RPG.

name: Astrodition
description: In this space adventure game set on Ceres, you'll find yourself using the resources from your crashed ship to stay alive and solve the mystery of why it failed, can you get off of the surface alive?

name: 31st Prototype
description: This is a steampunk puzzle game. player use ↑↓←→to control the robot,press Z/ENTER/SPACE to explore the map, and press X/ESC to save game The frame is sketch style, let you immerse the retro atomospher.

name: Phoenix Point: Legacy of the Ancients
description: Legacy of the Ancients delves into the secrets of the Antediluvian Civilization that predated modern humans on Earth. Explore ancient ruins for precursor knowledge, and use it to unlock a whole new line of Phoenix Point weapons and technologies. But beware: the Ancients left powerful guardians to watch over their secrets; you won't be the only one seeking to control this ancient knowledge. New rivals will rise up as the legacy of the ancients is revealed to humanity.

name: Sea Wolf: Tactics
description: A turn-based strategy game with snappy combat and meaningful character progression. Lead a small party of vikings on raids and defend your village while seeking fame and glory.

name: Morth
description: A darkness has fallen over the village of Drakehorn. People have gone missing in the night and have been seen walking into the woods and never returning. Find out what's causing these disappearances before time runs out.

name: Little Robot Stories
description: Little robots have stories. Follow a little robot as it explores the city, makes friends, and has fun... and pizza. Little robots like pizza.

name: Timber Jump VR
description: Timber Jump is a VR game mimicking a true adventure experience that will make you face and conquer your height fears, and allow you to feel the experience of jumping between timbers above mountains.

name: My Empire
description: My Empire is a fun turn based 4x strategy game.

name: 正宗台灣十六張麻將
description: Sin descripción

name: Phoenix Point: Festering Skies
description: Take the fight to the air with Festering Skies, the latest DLC for Phoenix Point. Festering Skies features a new interception mode, new missions, a new mission type, an original campaign story, and much more.

name: Miguelshroom: First Day at School
description: Reassemble Miguelshroom's first day at school, in this puzzle followed by a narrative on a top-down platform. Guide the cute mushroom that lives in a fantastic world in its discoveries.

name: Super Seals Float
description: A puzzle game where you: slide, hop, ride, plop, pounce and bounce to get to the bubbles. Make the correct moves or sink into the sea of loneliness.

name: Pocket Plants
description: Explore environments as a mushroom man, collecting, planting, and watering plants to level up and restore the area by clearing fog or restoring crystal light.

name: Slaughterhouse
description: Grabbing some weapons off the ground and slipping on a bulletproof vest, you head out to escape the slaughterhouse that has held you captive and transformed you into the bovine hybrid you are today. Your fellow bovines need you!

name: Retention: A Love Story
description: A short puzzle game with a big story to tell. Dive in to reveal the mysteries of Amy's past.

name: Enyla X
description: Elyna X is shoot'em up (Shmup) for 2 players in cooperative mode.The year is 3864, mysterious ships appear and iniciate a terrible attack against planet Earth, It is up to Enyla, a courageous space pilot, to lead the space fleets in defense of her beloved planet.

name: Ribby Rocket
description: The robot army has invaded Ribby's beautiful island and he's looking for some payback.

name: Throw Me in the River
description: A visual novel about a man experiencing his family relationships through a state of compressed time. Choose what happened in his past and then watch it play out as you explore family dynamics and the effects that a person's life events can have on the way they interact with others.

name: Ready? Set. Haiya!
description: Ready? Set. Haiya! is a fighting-styled rhythm game, where players follow on-screen commands and try to time them as perfectly as they can, to try and beat their opponents to the beat in this epic groovy showdown.

name: Ultima Adventum
description: It lies upon the shoulders of Alana and other three Arises, fated individuals, to stop the plague that is to come. Through the darkest dungeons and longest journeys, they must build the courage and power to save their world.

name: Retro Clicker
description: Retro Clicker - A beautiful retro clicker with a huge variety of monsters. The player hires various units for the knocked out gold and goes through an endless world of levels.

name: Endless Heck
description: Get to the exit as fast as you can in this endless speed running game. Don't hit the wall!

name: Robot Start: Puzzle Game
description: In this puzzle game, play as an agile robot whose duty is to turn on the facility computers.

name: The Lost Shrine: Escape Room
description: The Lost Shrine is an adventure, puzzle VR game. It will bring you back in the past by exploring a roman shrine, an inter-dimensional space and also the industrial age! Explore, solve the puzzles and continue! Your goal is to go through the multiple levels and escape!

name: StarPicker
description: Immersed in a fantastic universe, challenge your navigational skills on unknown territories.

name: Chaotic Airport Construction Manager
description: A simulation game making fun of Germans needing 16 years to build an airport. Are you able to do better?

name: Xob
description: Xob. Kinetic. Psychedelic. Poetic. Aesthetic. 100 masterfully designed puzzles.

name: The Heartbeat
description: The Heartbeat is a lightweight political simulation game that incorporates rhythmic, text-oriented options. All the player has to do in the game is keep himself and the city alive as much as possible.

name: Penny RPG: Shadows of the Lost - A Blood City Tale
description: After waking up in a strange unfamiliar hospital bed after a two year coma, John Smith decides to salvage what's left of his life and live a quiet and peaceful existence. Journey through Chicago with John Smith in this classic noir 2D RPG/ adventure game thriller.

name: Cult of Dawn
description: Attempt to survive as a mysterious event strips away the bounds of reality itself in Cult of Dawn, a third person horror adventure inspired by classic survival horror titles of the 90s and early 2000s. Featuring tank controls, fixed and over the shoulder camera angles, inventory management and more.

name: Tower of Portal
description: Tower of Portal is a little Indie FPS Shooter, where you control a soldier with the mission to destroy the AI Central Computer that controls the machines spreads in the city. Your mission is avoid this domination through the machines.

name: Escape Fishstop 3D
description: A horror game like no other with a crazy plot. So many characters that make you laugh. With great sound effects and eerie atmosphere of Dungeons, FishStop, atmospheric music, jokes and more!

name: Bricks Frenzy
description: Bricks Frenzy is an arcade brick game developed to be both competitive and fun at the same time. Do your best with all the power ups available and gain mastery over them to defeat your opponents.

name: Poly Race
description: We try to continue on the road without hitting the vehicles around us.

name: Survival Instinct
description: You are the lucky one (or not) who managed to survive the most powerful solar flare in history and then plunge headlong into the permafrost. Can you adapt to the new conditions on Earth without losing your sanity and retaining your humanity?

name: Zball V
description: "Zball V" is the return of a series of physics-based puzzles. In the new game you will handle with moving platforms and that will make the goal even more difficult to achieve!

name: Magnesium 173
description: Magnesium_173 is an elegant puzzle game inspired by quantum mechanics. Discard your conventional understanding of time and explore what it takes to make a meaningful choice.

name: Diodius: Premonition
description: The Shadow Doge has returned. This is very bad for Bromberg, but there is hope - a new soldier, Rindo, is graduating from the military school. Kill enemies, build new weapons and beat the Doge in this modern Bullet Hell game!

name: VR Immortal Fight
description: Virtual Reality Fighting game with Insane 3d graphics and Fighting actions

name: Ice Star Tribes
description: Action , adventure shooter in the dark world.

name: The Rogue Cavern
description: Explore an endless, procedurally generated cavern and find items in this roguevania-esque platformer.

name: Data Mining X
description: Data mining X - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

name: I See Red
description: A frantic twin-stick shooter roguelite where you must rage through different spaceships filled with enemies. Steal their weapons, destroy every room, and use all you can find to attack. Are you strong enough to fulfill your revenge?

name: Vaccine19
description: 100% Free 'Hip-Fire' Arcade Shooter! Instead of using crosshairs or sights on gun, Vaccine19 has the player visualize shot trajectory. Don't Get Infected!

name: Adventure Mosaics: Granny's Farm
description: Adventure Mosaics - Granny's Farm — Uncover hidden pictures! Help Granny and Ellie get the farm in order!

name: Roads of Time 2: Odyssey
description: Roads of Time is a fun strategy game all about adventure and historical discoveries! Save history from collapsing in time!

name: Mixology
description: This is not just any drinking game! Welcome to the Mixology Hostess Club, dear customer! You seem to have accidentally stumbled upon this club but, oh well! Time for drinks and most importantly... the hostesses! Successfully woo them and you could become more than a customer!

name: Dissident: Frostland Escape
description: A survival game about prisoners escaping from forced labor camps. A progressive, atmospheric tale - and all of it grounded in historical facts.

name: Soul Shifter
description: In Soul Shifter, the player breaks through the ruins of what was once the most glorious of the castles and discovers the secrets behind the magical elemental energy that brought prosperity but also disgrace to the kingdom.

name: A Curse from Beyond
description: A text-based cosmic horror adventure game

name: ElementalsFight
description: ElementalsFight is a real-time strategy game where you only need to control one fighter. It is an independent sequel to the popular Warcraft III mod - Castle Fight.

name: Stouthollow Tales
description: You've inherited an item shop! Congratulations! now get to work! You'll need to exploit the land, crafting with the guilds and fishing the sea to prosper in this JRPG inspired item-shop management game!

name: No One Lives in Heaven
description: What happens to the inhabitants of a game world after you have finished it? In the story-driven, 40-hour role-playing game No one lives in heaven, you will encounter over 200 unique NPCs with over 300 quests that can be solved in various ways. Philosophical and crazy.

name: Magical Cat Cafe and Heroes
description: Magical Cat Cafe and Heroes is a word adventure game that tells the story of cats fighting an epidemic from the perspective of an outsider

name: Save the Planet
description: Protect your planet from alien attacks by controlling an orbital platform in this space arcade game. And if you get bored - turn on the "silent mode" and enjoy this hell! Score points, upgrade your weapons, compete with your friends, and become the best!

name: Anarkade
description: Anarkade is a Multiplayer Arena Shooter with 2D platforming mechanics that features multiple weapons, randomly generated arenas, and humorously bloody animations.

name: Rushing Beat of Rage
description: Rushing Beat of Rage is a hardcore action fighting game. Players who like classic arcade games should not miss it. The hearty floating combo and the quickly block are the favorites of operation enthusiasts.Start to show your operation!

name: Bog Lord
description: Bog Lord is a casual turn-based strategy game about commanding monstrous units and conquering terrain. Outsmart your friends in short local multiplayer matches and claim victory in the struggle between the chaotic bog and deathly fowl.

name: Burning Sun
description: In the ancient holy city of Igra, the sun suddenly burns with crushing heat. Even a second too long in the sun and you will be burnt to crisp. Enduring the Burning Sun, it is up to you to save the city. What will you do? What will you do? What will you become?

name: Mother Hub
description: A first person shooter horror, inspired by classics like Half-Life, Doom 3, Fallout, and Deadspace. You must try to survive and save the last of humanity, trapped within a massive vault in the distant future. Discover the secrets of the past in a lore rich world.

name: Battle Village
description: Battle Village is a top down shooter where the player has to control a tank and defend the base from enemies.

name: 制服少女
description: 讲述了一个佣兵团帮助人们排忧解难的故事。

name: Destructive Behavior
description: Brick breaker arcade action with unique features

name: Tyrgard Archer VR
description: Prepare yourself against the incoming hordes of unique enemies! Dodge flying spears, magical ravens and kamikaze dragons! Immerse yourself in a stylish low-poly environment. Upgrade your bow, improve your skill and become the champion Tyrgard needs you to be!

name: Goblin Rush
description: You have been caught in a dungeon and must now fight your way to freedom. This is not an easy task however, as you will meet deadly goblins and other lurking creatures on your way.

name: Polybeyond
description: Welcome to the PolyBeyond Corporation. In this Third Person Multiplayer Loot and Shoot you play as a scrapbot controlled by an employee of The Corporation. Collect weapons and survive to face other players for financial gain. Sell off your items after successful runs to fund your next loadout.

name: Snack Tick
description: In order to survive as an Alien Insect, you have to obtain sustenance, find cover and avoid the bigger Aliens! In this Multiplayer party Adventure, players will be able to take control of various bugs with different abilities in a variety of locations.

name: Daffodil Yellow: A Few Poems From an Insect Collector
description: You are an insect collector looking for colors in old summer memories...

name: Warp Out
description: A VR exclusive shoot 'em up, Warp Out projects you in four different worlds full of enemies to destroy. Only your skill can bring you to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Pets VR
description:
Some charming pets are waiting for you to play with them - come and see what they’re up to in Pets VR!
There is a lot to do in Pets Resort, some of your duties will include: Petting cute doggo, playing with adorable Cat, making sure that they both have something to snack on and are well-rested, walking without a care in the world through the beautiful park, playing one of the multiple mini-games in which you can win special points!
Ready for some challenges? Time for some training! Learn special gestures and instruct your pet to perform different tricks - if you’re consistent it gets easier in time but be aware the pet can also forget some lessons! Reward yourself and your pupil and make it fancy! Exchange points to create your own collection of fun accessories for you and your pet to enjoy. Discover everything Pets VR can offer and most importantly, have fun!

name: Fruit Factory
description: A silly physics-based puzzle game about sorting fruit with industrial machines!

name: Phantast
description: Help Phantast save his tribe in this atmospheric and quirky top-down shooter!

name: Frogiee
description: Frogiee is a fast, precision-based platformer where the main character is Mr. Frogiee. Climb the three mountains and kill the sick and evil frogs.

name: Rogue Masters
description: Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.

name: Blue Prince
description: Welcome to Mt. Holly, where every dawn unveils a new mystery. Navigate through shifting corridors and ever-changing chambers in this genre-defying strategy puzzle adventure. But will the unpredictable path you create lead you to the rumored Room 46?

name: Gourmet Food Wizard
description: This is a real time card combat game with magic and gourmet food!Players capture magic objects, make food, use a super variety of magic [/ b], set foot on the adventure!The game level is randomly generated, the enemy is a new concept of no health, please enjoy the battle of releasing magic!

name: Revenge on the Streets 2
description: In this game you will play with (Saul) who had his sister kidnapped by a crime boss, (Saul) proposes to save her and will make his revenge on the streets.

name: Deep States Story
description: This is a stand-alone boxing game, you need to choose the right time to punch in order to cause harm to the opponent. Straight punches are fast, and swing punches are strong. You can try to hit a combination punch with more damage.You may discover new things while playing.

name: Historical Games: Chariot Racing
description: Relive the spectacle of Roman chariot racing in this VR action-racing game where victory is attained by any means necessary. Get into your chariot in the Circus Maximus and race for one of four teams, each staking everything on a different strategy to victory.

name: Durdanto
description: DurDanto is a roguevania like pixel art platformer game where you play as Zubok in a fallen city with beautiful pixel art environments while facing different enemies. Use elemental abilities to uncover secrets of the fallen city & solve environmental puzzles to unlock game levels!

name: Healing Animal
description: Healing Animals is a game where you help out adorable animals on a relaxing journey, and escape from the dark reality with a blind girl called Anna. Find the puzzle pieces to solve problems in animal town to help Anna heal her emotional wounds.

name: The Trigger
description: The Trigger is a first person puzzle game. The goal of the game is to find a way out. Each time you start the game levels are procedurally generated. Generated from 50 to 70 rooms The maze is filled with traps. There are 3 types of traps in total.

name: One Shot
description: Online multiplayer game, kill zombie and win others to get new items.

name: Submachine: Legacy
description: Submachine is a point and click adventure game. You will explore a network of interconnected rooms and solve puzzles with items you find along the way. This is a complete remaster of the entire Submachine series.

name: Clouds of Rain
description: In Clouds of Rain you will play multiple characters, each with his own story. Explore a hand drawn world with various regions, face harsh battles and sail the skies. Resource management, preparation and tactical fights are at the core of the game.

name: Epic Diavolo
description: Epic Diavolo is a platformer action adventure game with lots of challenges. Beat Mr Creepy's strange creatures and, save your only friend Epic Chicken.

name: Go, Go Cowboy
description: Fast and hurricane Top-Down-Shooter where you act as a Sheriff in the Wild West and must quickly deal with all the bandits in the area, arm yourself with your trusty revolver and go on a dangerous journey!

name: Tomatenquark
description: Tomatenquark is a multiplayer & singleplayer first person shooter, a community homage to Cube 2: Sauerbraten.

name: Age of Fear 5: The Day of the Rat
description: Play as Indulf, a Black Knight in the Undead Legion with ambitions to build an empire of his own. Alongside the young Witch Lexa, set out on a lawless quest to plunder the realm. Age of Fear is a complex turn-based strategy series (full of jokes!) that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements.

name: Art Syndicate
description: Put your management skills to the test as an art gallery owner, exhibit the most brilliant paintings, create your own, and if you've already broken your moral compass try to snatch some precious artworks from your competition - "Exitus acta probat"!

name: Atrius Star
description: Bullet hell roguelite with challenging AI, fun weapons, monster infighting, and speed running.

name: Rock'n Cow
description: A survival game with the soul of Rock and Blues. Use a variety of weapons and equipment to defend your farm before it's too late.

name: Zombie Frenzy
description: Your city has been overwhelmed by zombies and you need to survive in extreme environments

name: Reshaping Mars
description: Reshaping Mars is a colony simulation game on Mars, you will start by gathering resources, storing food, accepting immigrants, and building a better colony together. Develop powerful technologies for Mars Reshaping, make Mars great agai..sorry, just great. Don't forget to make the residents happy.

name: Citadale: The Awakened Spirit
description: A Hero just can't enjoy some peace now, can he? The sexy seductress Succubus is out for revenge on Arion Dorleac just when he wants to get married and get some sexy times on. Because of course she has to attack on his wedding day...

name: Easter Riddles
description: A game and a brain teaser in one! The new Easter Riddles is a great way to spend an evening improving your mind!

name: Rising Front
description: A single-player, large scale WW1 game centered around trench warfare. It is a mix of FPS, Battle Sim and Strategy, making for epic battles with hundreds of units on the battlefield!

name: Gnome Tournament
description: In Gnome Tournament you to go up against your friends in different scenarios may the best Gnome win!

name: Tales of Chandar
description: Tales Of Chandar is a turn-based strategy RPG, where you have to survive the dangerous lands of Chandar, and take back the kidnapped princess to her father.

name: Dangerous Plane
description: The stalactites you do not crash will earn you points. Each score you earn will prove how good your reflexes are. You have to go through the space between the stalactites.

name: Ninety Days
description: Ninety Days is a Tower Defense game where the player defends his tower, improving it from the amount of gold coins earned, building defense and attack upgrades to hold back waves of enemies, archers, swordsmen, giants, catapults and evil ravens for 90 days.

name: Hop Step Sing VR Live: Hop Summer Tour 2020
description: Hop Step Sing!'s first VR live performance, Hop★Summer Tour 2020 is now available on Steam! Put on your VR goggles and enjoy the 360-degree immersive live concert experience you had never seen before!

name: No Hope
description: No Hope is a survival horror game based on the classics of the genre. You are a teenager and you must survive the darkness that has fallen over the city. There are terrible monster along the way, few resources, locked doors and some scares.

name: Under the Counter
description: Under the Counter is a narrative simulation in which you run a bar on a local market. Your task is to solve the mystery of missing people while serving food and moonshine to local fellows and demonic forces from a parallel world.

name: King and Kingdoms
description: Factions, countries and empires that have truly existed in the real history await you. The only difference is that it is in your hand to rewrite their history. Become the ruler of any country you want and lead your nation from small village to the way to be the magnificent empire!

name: Lycanthorn II: Rain of Beasts
description:
Lycanthorn II: Rain of Beasts is a 3d homage to retro classics. Explore an open world and use different characters to explore dungeons and lands full of demons and beasts from legend.

With First Person melee combat, you'll dash, dodge and dice around your enemies! Not a fan of melee? Try out the other characters that each have a variety of attacks.

name: Stupid Stories
description: Stupid Stories - A 2D adventure. Travel through time and relive your grandfather's exciting adventures, or at least how he remembers them.

name: Target Runner
description: Target Runner is a 2D platformer with a side view. The player controls a character whose goal is to pass levels avoiding deadly traps. Get ready, the game challenges even the most inveterate fans of the genre! Be patient, you will need all the experience of a seasoned gamer to pass it to the end.

name: Infraspace
description: InfraSpace is a sci-fi city builder - but every resource you produce has to go through your transport infrastructure. In order to thrive in this solar system, you'll not only have to start mining operations and manage production chains, but also make sure your road network is up to the task.

name: Metal Tales: Overkill
description: Metal Tales: Overkill is an action-adventure game where Metal and Adrenaline clash to give you the ultimate 3D roguelike guitar-shooter. Fight against the looming curse affecting your Metal brothers and free them from an ancient evil.

name: Two Strikes
description: Dive into the heart of ancient Japan in Two Strikes, a 2D combat extravaganza with breathtaking hand-drawn animations. As a fearless samurai, warrior monk, or daring outlaw, engage in electrifying duels where every strike can be your last.

name: Bomb Escape
description: Bomb Escape is a game of skill and reflex. Avoid everything and prove that you will have the best time in the arena!

name: This Game Might Improve Your Memory
description: A short, experimental point-and-click adventure game with crass humor and horror. Also designed to teaches memory techniques.

name: Brother Wake Up
description: Help your little brother get rid of the "Clockmaker's" curse.

name: Humans Took My Neighbors!
description: Humans took my neighbors is a 2D top down action game, you’ll go through the neighborhoods saving as many monsters as you can, fighting humans ready to take every monster they see, and as you progress through the levels maybe find the cause for this invasion.

name: Undiscovered House
description: First-person, story-based horror game. The game evokes a grim atmosphere, a sense of dread, and tension. Players solve mild puzzles and find and use keys. They find supplies for a flashlight and experience jump scares. Discover the gruesome secrets of the house.

name: Paws on the Sand: Lionessy Sins
description: Party based RPG-platformer with hand-drawn 2D graphics. The action takes place in the ancient world, based on the Sumer-Akkadian, Egyptian and ancient Slavic mythology. The world is filled with city-states, pagan deities and gloomy dungeons. There are no humans in the game, only anthro-animals!

name: Lonely Red Night
description: Uncover the truth in the red world!

name: Pilko
description: Pilko is a simple and fun platform game starring a skilled ball in search of gems.

name: Dungeon Swappers
description: Compete with others to see who can build the best dungeon. Then swap dungeons and race to be the first to escape.

name: Farathan
description: Third-person Indie RPG. Big, open, Medieval-fantasy - world. With lots of monsters and quests. A game for true explorers and adventurers looking for challenges. Rise back to the top as the emperors lost son Eristan - that has to survive in the dark world of Elion.

name: The Drifting Woods
description: Join Amelia Dair apprentice witch extraordinaire, as she discovers her powers, unravels the mysteries of Sigil Island and learns about her family's dark past.

name: Cats in Time
description: A relaxing puzzle game in which you explore 3D dioramas, solve puzzles and save cats lost in time! Crazy, right?!

name: Trapped Guys
description: Many rooms, many traps, as well as many rooms with traps... Friends, or rivals? Trapped Guys is a multiplayer platformer, where four "friends" unfortunately have to go through a difficult test, which will show which of them is the fastest, dexterous or perhaps the most insidious?

name: Finding Alina
description: Alina was kidnapped! You must find her through this indie point-and-click game! Your best intel indicates that Alina is likely to be in this abandoned building. Navigate along the scenes to find clues and items that will let you overcome your obstacles.

name: Train Ride Simulator
description: Discover the best train simulator!

name: The Skies: Reborn
description: The Skies Reborn is a post-apocalyptic MMORPG in which you follow your own path or join other players to conquer the wasteland.

name: Deceased
description: Deceased is set entirely in and around a mansion presented in first-person, free-roaming 3D. You will need to "pick up key elements, and search for things that may help you escape.

name: Ninjas Busters: Whack A Ninja
description: When whack-a-mole meets Ninjas. Discover "Whack A Ninja", an arcade-type indie game created by Chris Braibant. Beat all the ninjas in this intense, action-packed game, in the pursuit of the best score and sadistic pleasure of experimenting with all the ways to eliminate those cowled suckers.

name: Code 3: Police Response
description: Code 3 is a tactical police based first person shooter developed for the PC made by police and police support personnel.

name: Ship Handling Simulator
description: Ship handling, maneuvering and mooring with tugboats simulator. Feel like the captain of a passenger ships, cruise liners, cargo ships, battleships or aircraft carrier.

name: Blob Person
description: An adventurous Blob Person is transported to a simulacrum of his own world. An enigmatic entity follows their every move. How did Blob Person get here? and why? Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to uncover the truth of this strange place and escape.

name: From the Darkness
description: From the darkness is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an old Soviet abandoned apartment.

name: Fruit Row
description: Is an intelligent game in the style of "Tetris", but in modern processing, where you have to line up the same fruit in a row to get experience points

name: Rotatex 2
description: Rotatex 2 is a Ninja cat with spinning, jumping puzzles and parkour!

name: This is My Dungeon
description: You are the Dungeon Master. Manage the dungeon, direct the monsters and fight off intruders who try to destroy the dungeon core!

name: Gotta Date Them All
description: Enjoy a cute romance that's fun to play. Develop bonds and find out more about each girl. Rule the world! ... or at least mean the world to all of these characters. Gotta Date Them All is a dating sim that puts gameplay first with earning cute events and bonding as a fun reward.

name: Asterrunner
description: Travel through dangerous asteroid field, avoid obstacles and collect loot.

name: Deep Enigma
description: The game has about 320 rooms, 10 areas, and 328 upgrade hidden items! Can you find them all?

name: Chessality
description: Fully packed VR chess experience for casual, enthusiasts, and serious alike! Cross-platform chess matches including integration with lichess!

name: Lotus Bloom
description: Lotus Bloom is a relaxing minimalist puzzle game. Connect orbs, generate energy and make flowers bloom.

name: Cyber City Escape
description: Cyber City Escape is a 3D topdown roguelite shooter set in a cyberpunk world. The game features procedurally generated maps, fog of war fueled exploration, multiple weapon types, multiple enemy types, environmental hazards and traps, equipment kiosks to buy gear, permanent progression and more.

name: Mage Mountain
description: Pick-up-and-play Deckbuilder with lots of synergistic depth. Slice through undead foes, and Level-up your 7 STATS. Synergize your STATS with your cards to maximize their effectiveness.

name: The Great Hide n Seek Expawdition
description: A chill find-them-all game with roguelite elements and local coop for little and big kids. Find all the animal babies that went hiding away in the forest. Play as a raccoon dad or a rabbit mum, explore the environments, find hidden treasures and bring everybody home.

name: Software House Simulator
description: Eat, sleep, release a game, repeat. Release games, console, controller, etc... and try the thrill of becoming a billionaire!

name: Red Adventure
description: Red Adventure - A platformer with some elements of Metroidvania, where the player has to explore a completely open world, collecting various improvements for his player, which will help to pass impassable places and climb into unique levels.

name: Death Park 2
description: Fight monsters, solve puzzles and uncover Farland's secret and the clown's origin in this sci-fi horror game!

name: Hairdresser Simulator
description: Grab your scissors and delve into the world of hairstyles! Generate profit to further work on your craft and expand your salon. Improve your skills and become the best of the best!

name: Pre-Shave
description: A shaving simulator about a brown man dealing with a hairy situation.

name: Seiga Kaku Uses Her Amazing Taoist Arts and Gives You a Life Lesson
description: This short visual novel is a derivative work of the Touhou Project. The wicked hermit Seiga Kaku uses her Taoist arts to help you achieve your goals and become a better person.

name: Buratino
description: Buratino is a 2D arcade game with light adventure elements for the ZX Spectrum 8-bit computer.

name: Journey for the Crown
description: Journey for the Crown is a single player, team-based, story driven, open-world adventure game using multiple characters without the need to pause in combat. This action based combat system brings interesting and new ways to manage your team in a fun way. Journey for the Crown brings a lengthy choose your own adventure dialogue system with over 250 zones to explore, countless hours of quests, adventures and treasures to discover.

name: Collisus
description: Collisus will be the Ultimate Gun-Fu Simulator with a 2.5D Gun-Fu system as the marvel of this game developed to perfection to set a standard never seen before in shooters.

name: Isekai: Reincarnation in a New World
description: Isekai: Reincarnation in a New World is an RPG game where the player takes on the role of an animal and must survive in a classic fantasy world while trying to find out what happened in their past.

name: A Pretty Odd Bunny
description: A Pretty Odd Bunny is a stealth platformer about a rabbit who likes eating pigs. You play as a red-eyed rabbit and help him reach the pig at the end of every level. But don't let your fellow bunnies see you. They will do everything they can to stop you.

name: Project Hive
description: Project Hive is a third-person shooter game in which you play as Alexei, a survivor stranded in the destroyed mining facility Hive on the planet Proxima. His quest will lead him through the dark secrets of Talium Industries.

name: 百詰怪軼與金魚
description: 唯美奇幻的多結局視覺小說。現實與非現實模糊地交替────被遺留或被遺忘的人們的故事。搶先體驗序章故事

name: Crumbling City
description: In this game you're a giant monster who likes to destroy buildings, cars and such. You live in a procedurally generated city with lots of scenery and nature. Since destroying cities with your bare hands is quite difficult you can use various destructive weapons and firearms after unlocking them.

name: Boston AInamics
description: The goal of the game it to reach the finish by getting through different obstacles. To do this, teach your robot particular movements - place the icons onto the appropriate place and watch the robot's progress.

name: Legends of Valhalla
description: You are a Norse God, wandering Midgard and harnessing your powers to fight for fame, glory and loot! Legends Of Valhalla is an Multiplayer Open World Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world. With a focus on visceral action combat, powerful items and deep character customization!

name: BattleStick 2
description: BattleStick 2 is a humorous free-to-play physics-based 2D stickman Multiplayer Game where you fight other stickmen in an arena with loads of equipment to choose from! It's a direct successor to BattleStick!

name: Univers
description: Survival in space. Explore, repair and build in an ancient spaceship that lost its way many, many years ago...

name: Everpixel Valley
description: Everpixel Valley is what happens when you combine farming sim, ARPG, dinosaurs, and wiener dogs. Turn your dusty plot of land into a fantastical, bustling, farm. But be careful - you'll have to defend your hard work from hordes of pixelated foes.

name: Project: Inferno
description: Run, jump, dash, explore and FIRE in this 16-bit platformer.

name: Lumber Party
description: An online or local multiplayer space monkey racing platformer. Fight your way to the top to grab the banana with tons of different ways to play.

name: Kulan
description: Kulan, is a visual novel with a visual and video graphic section, with occasions to interact in the game, where a very peculiar and idiotic alien, embarked on an epic story to save his father through time

name: Total Havoc
description: Total Havoc is a fast paced FPS game that offers loads of fun across many maps and modes. A true must play for all FPS enthusiasts.

name: Blessings of No-more
description: Blessings of No-more is a 3d rogue-like turn-based RPG. Collect blessings and get stronger with every death to overcome impossible enemies and regain your life.

name: Tales of Herring Lake
description: Welcome to Tales of Herring Lake, where your favourite Sunday fishing show meets Alfred Hitchcock. Grab your gear and start shaping your story!

name: 末代侠客
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Furry Ping-Pong
description: Welcome to Endless Furry Ping-Pong! The 7th installment of the "Endless Furry" Series! This game is a simple recreation of the classic Pong game, but with a furry twist!

name: Celestial Empire
description: The Emperor has chosen you as a new provincial governor. It is now your duty to maintain peace and prosperity in the region. Design the city of your dreams, trade with other landlords and take care of your people’s needs. Ensure their survival through harsh winters and disasters ravaging the land.

name: Terraformers: First Steps on Mars
description: Terraformers: First Steps on Mars is a free standalone version of Terraformers, featuring an exclusive mission taking place before the main game.

name: Space Explore
description: Space Explore gives you a first hand experience of the journey that astronauts take while embarking on space missions. The space station circles the earth, 400 kilometers above us. It serves as a research laboratory and is also suited for testing spacecraft systems and equipment.

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Super Head Ball
description: Super Head Ball is an action-packed party game that pits two teams of warriors against each other as they attempt to throw a decapitated head into a blazing pyre. With simple controls and 4-player local multiplayer, matches are fast, frantic, and intense.

name: Valiantia
description: Valiantia is a role-playing game. Solve the puzzles. Altis, a female knight, and you, Leonale as her confidant, were ordered to do missions. You can help her ease the problems, making the decision, or make them more complicated. Her fate depends on you.

name: Soul Dossier
description: Soul Dossier is a multiplayer game based on Oriental culture (5vS1). The game is based on a variety of traditional Oriental cultures, including five elements, eight diagrams and folklore.

name: Blob Lander
description: This is a very interesting game, you need to control the safe landing of the spacecraft to the destination, together to challenge it!

name: Zorro: The Chronicles
description: Zorro: The Chronicles is an exciting and humorous game featuring combat and exploration gameplay inspired by the best action games in class.

name: Human Origin
description: The most important to play this game is to wear a headphone !The built-in videos is not only a game play tutorial, but also an interesting story. which is an hour long .and full of suspense,laughs,pains in it

name: If Fusion Were That Easy
description: "If Fusion Were That Easy" is a humorous 2.5D point-and-click adventure about cold fusion and preventing the apocalypse. Explore a diverse world, master tricky puzzles and stop the inevitable.

name: Atomic Guardians
description: ATOMIC GUARDIANS is a fully CO-OP arcade retro shoot 'em up, where one player flies the ship, and the other player mans the shields. Fight your way through a never ending horde of Brutal Bosses, Alien Monsters and Gigantic Asteroids as you rack up a new world-wide high score. Play with up to three friends, and see how long you can last!

name: Calculate It!
description: CALCULATE IT is a casual math puzzle game with various mathsymbols, which is based on the calculator. You need to make a target number with your logic skills and creativity.

name: Dallen Clicker Ultimate
description: Dallen Clicker Ultimate is an enhanced remake of Dallen Clicker, an incremental game.

name: Space Pirate King
description: Become a villainous space pirate. Aim for the Pirate King! Customize your space battleship. Attack passenger ships, rob cargo ships, and defeat guards! Japanese indie games

name: Press Ctrl
description: A mind-bending puzzler where your avatar controls another avatar via an in-game keyboard.

name: Ichth.ys
description: Ichth.ys is a visual novel with turn-based combat where your choices affect the story! You follow Fraser, a hacker who was recently expelled from university, in a tale of mystery, deception, censorship, freedom, and board game cafes!

name: Canvas Hockey
description: Canvas Hockey is a top-down, arcade-style party game with local multiplayer tournaments and a single player or co-op campaign. The game uses a painted art-style with inspirations from the 90's.

name: Miko Adventures Puffball
description: Miko is a raccoon who lost his way while wandering through the forest, he discovers a portal and upon touching it he finds himself in a world full of dangers. Miko is transported into another dimension and your goal is to help him find a way back home.

name: Penelope
description: Navigate and manipulate your dreams in this challenging puzzle. Rescue all of Penelope's stuffed animal friends before you run out of warm milk. Can you outwit the dastardly Emily Watterson and get back the toy she stole from you?

name: After You
description: After You is a narrative game with puzzles, but it is not an easy game, here you will not have indicators or tutorials, nor can you save when you want. In After You you need to put all your attention and use paper and pencil to move forward, if you're looking for an easy game, this is not your game.

name: Village Defender
description: Village Defender is a 2D game in which the player fights off waves of enemies, raises a level that improves health and damage power, accumulates mana and uses a special skill.

name: Angelwood
description: As another ordinary year at St. Gregory's High School approaches, student John Smith finds out that a mafia has been controlling his town in the shadows. By joining the Honors Community Outreach, his friends and he will try to expose the mafia's crimes.

name: Deja Vu
description: A minimalist puzzle game about life, death, and clones.

name: Operation: Vicus
description: Hey, so you're the chosen one? Welcome to your new home, your village! Build it up, develop it, take care of the needs of its inhabitants and fight the evil that haunts your village. But the most important thing is, can you solve the mystery of the village?

name: Stella Voyager
description: Open World Space Exploring Trading Shmup RPG. Space sheriff fighting outlaws. King of inter planet trade. Investor who contribute to the development of the planets. The choice Is yours.

name: Solitaire: Elemental Wizards
description: Classic Solitaire in a fantasy setting! Help Archmage Gideon regain his former glory!

name: Drift Long Racing
description: Enter your favorite car and make a record in this unique arcade game, either alone or with friends!

name: In Search of Fon Vitae
description: "In Search of Fon Vitae" is a mix of roguelike and exploration adventure in a procedural generated pirate themed world.

name: Pitched Battle
description: This game is a war game. It has a top-looking player's eye. Your tank is ready for you. 3D realistic models have tanks, Are you ready for a long war with your friends?

name: Hmmsim Metro
description: Line 1, the most complicated subway in Seoul, is now coming in PC version. You can feel high immersion with the graphics that realize the actual Seoul scenery, the train driving sound, and the realistic train driving system. Experience the operation of the Seoul subway!

name: Santa's Toy Factory Nonograms
description: Get into the spirit of the holiday with 120 exciting nonograms! Stop by and visit Father Christmas!

name: Heptagon
description: HEPTAGON is a fast-paced and fluid action game designed to push your reflexes to their limits.

name: Space Cube Racers
description: Space racing game for up to 4 players (local, split-screen). It uses newtownian mechanics but with an easily to pilot control scheme where your ship will always thrust along your line of sight.

name: Jack 'n' Hat
description: The sinister Dr. Voo Doom has kidnapped the Princess of Ririland and incited a civil war! It's up to repairman extraordinaire, Jack and his boomerang hat to save her and restore peace! Jump through 20+ huge levels, collecting Crystals, Stars and more! Can you save Ririland?

name: Elmarion: Dragon's Princess
description: Elmarion: Dragon’s Princess is an RPG about a Dragon and a Princess. A player plays as a Dragon: flies across a large 3D world, burns whole armies of people, explores interesting locations. Aim of the game: to save the world of Dragons and people together with the Princess.

name: Toybox
description: Hundreds of packs, thousands of items. Can you collect them all?

name: Catch a Cat for 60 Seconds
description: Casual action game Avoid obstacles by jumping Catch and accelerate cats Compete for a 60-second flight distance on the leaderboard

name: Fugitive Criminal
description: Fugitive Criminal is a stealth maze puzzle with finding keys and doors with a top view. Locations are mazes with doors, some of which are locked and to go further you will have to find the keys that are hidden in the lockers. Complete 20 confusing levels to break free, good luck!

name: You Pilot a Piece of S***: Gaiden
description: You Pilot A Piece Of S***: GAIDEN is an in-depth examination of the turn-key stagnation most inherent in today's post-modern societal constructs...?

name: Just a Flu
description: Just A Flu is a strategy simulation game about fighting the deadly fast spreading disease. Decide how to deal with infected people, when to close transport hubs, declare quarantine, or lockdown. Can you not only stop pandemic but avoid panic and not destroy the economy, causing more harm?

name: The Sewers
description: As you are having a rest in your humble abode you have the urge that something is present, something dangerous. Now you trust the urge and decide it's time to leave. You've been pushing your luck for too long down here. As you walk to exit this place you once called home, your urge becomes a reality.

name: Mind Mirror
description: Help Omar to go through a puzzle experiment! Logical deductions, and solving problems skills will be required in this sci-fi puzzle environment. Let's combine puzzle, exploration, and escape room elements. You should also play with your friends!

name: 无眠夜曲
description: Use assault rifle against the magician! Or use the martial arts to smash the machine armor! Purify your blood, upgrade your skills, bring your favorite characters into the world of reincarnation! Players will operate through mouse or keyboard, adventure in a world of different styles!
