name: Black Ido
description: Now I can change the gravity, it opens up incredible possibilities. Does this really work in the AVA world? Have we really achieved the impossible?

name: Knight's Maze
description: Four brave knights in search of treasures appeared in an ancient labyrinth. Get them out of there, but don't forget about the traps. Go around them, solve unpretentious puzzles on your way, upon completion of which you will be closer and closer to freedom!

name: Unity Chan and Cube World!!
description: Unity Chan and Cube World!! is a Mario-like 3D platform game, in which rich and difficult traps and monsters are designed. Let's help the kawaii and naughty heroine - Unity Chan to defeat these stages one by one!

name: Mahjong Carnaval
description: Help the countess find unique masks! What hides behind the Mahjong tiles? Find the rarest masks by visiting carnivals around the world!

name: Slime Up
description: Slime Up is an infinite jumper where you jump around the city spraying mucus out of your nostrils and sliming people who get in your way. Rise to the top taking powerful powerups. Just be careful not to fall in the river of slime beneath you...

name: Angel at Dusk
description: Profusely Genuine! Explosively Orthodox! Shoot, dodge, and destroy! A die-hard style, faithful return to the origin of top down shooters!

name: Red Dungeon
description: You control the Outsider and explore multiple levels of a mysterious dungeon with secrets to uncover. As you explore and go deeper into the levels of this dungeon the enemies become more abundant, harder, and stronger. You can only hope you have enough firepower to suppress them.

name: Space Ape
description: How far can you take Dimitri the Russian Space Ape on his arcade adventure!

name: Nosferatu's Butler
description: A surveyor breaks into a mysterious and sinister Mansion on Pleasant Street in order to find his missing sister. She was last seen being interviewed by the mansion's young and mysterious Butler.

name: Decks & Daggers
description: DECKS & DAGGERS is a Deck-Building RPG Card Game where you venture down into the dungeons to slay monsters and collect treasure.

name: 修真之路
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmic Magus
description: A very challenging arcade spellcasting experience.

name: Cranky Cannon
description: A quirky challenging puzzle game! How many levels can you master?

name: Sloth Tales
description: "It's called Sloth Tales and it's about Jimmy's search for his biological father. Quite frankly it's brilliant." – Wordsworth the Panda.

name: Centrifugal
description: Navigate your rocket through the universe by using the centripetal and centrifugal forces! Wander around the stars and find your way home! Explore what's hidden at the end of the galaxy and have fun with your friends!

name: Petra and the Thylacine
description: Set in Launceston Tasmania's beautiful Cataract Gorge the player will adventure to find grandma's house.

name: Eagle Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Rundom
description: RUNDOM is a "human" racing game. Sprint, slide, blink, travel through portals and more just to be faster and earn your victory!

name: Rocket Panda Panic
description: It's a Panda-emic! Spreading across the globe causing panic and fear. Only one hero has the courage, power and cuteness to save us all. Join Pandy and his jetpack as they travel the world, protecting us from the critter panda plague.

name: My Dream Sport Dating Simulator
description: Do you like Sports? Do you really, really like sports? Enough to date one of them? No?... Well.. this is awkward. If you change your mind, oh boy we have the game for you. Become the next big sport, live your best school life, and romance up to seven other sports in this crazy visual novel.

name: Hell Shuffle
description: A driving mix of rogue-like card deckbuilder and turn-based strategic combat. Join one of the three factions, craft a unique deck, set up a squad, use a variety of talents, trinkets, items, and a perk tree to wipe out the debauched angelic Protectors again and again.

name: Trombone Champ
description: Honk, blow, & toot your way through over 20 songs, collect all 50 unique Tromboner Cards, and uncover the mysteries of the Trombiverse. Do you have what it takes to become the true Trombone Champ?

name: Spooky Speakeasy
description: Make and shake some truly monstrous drinks in this casual bartending simulator!

name: Meteora
description: Be a meteor in a constant race for survival in a young and chaotic universe by dodging, chasing & taking down other meteors in Meteora. Power up, strategize and put your skills to the test in our spectacular arcade combat racer!

name: False Dichotomy
description: Survive to return to your grieving wife. Face your sins. Kill demons. Save lives.

name: Side Effect
description: Side Effect is a first person exploration game that takes you to a waste covered island to fight pollution one garbage at a time. Team up with wild animals, discover hidden stories and defeat monster called pollution once and for all.

name: Arcano
description: Arcano is an over the top action adventure in VR. Playing as a secret agent, you'll make the impossible possible. Slow-motion shootouts and crazy stunts at a variety of exciting locations — all with online co-op.

name: HuoChaiRenRPG
description: "Matchman RPG" is a self-made RPG role-playing game.

name: Lost Dunes
description: Lost Dunes, the RPG, Exploration, Combat, Building game, explore the ancient dunes, help the locals, build pyramids, fight, and get your revenge on the bandits who pillaged your home!

name: Super Pixel World
description: A fun platformer game, where you're after a "friend" that owes you money, you'll find or buy abilities, discover new exits until you defeat the final boss, so you can set your friend free... Or not?

name: Turn on All the Lights
description: Turn on all the lights is a minimalist puzzle game that features a recursive mechanics in which the player has to explore micro pieces to connect a circuit and solve the main puzzle.

name: Tank Mechanic Simulator VR
description: Renovate & build II World War tanks. Experience highly detailed & realistic simulation game. Take tanks fully apart by using different tools. Transform them from rusty and ruined to fully working. Check them on the training ground, sell or put into your own museum.

name: Space Roaming
description: Space roaming is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly running forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

name: Chronicles of Lilith
description: You've been cursed, you've been betrayed. Now it's time for vengeance ! Journey through various lands to find your oppressor - Lilith. Be prepared as the journey will be a bloodshed. Kill whatever is in your path to find the ones that destroyed your life !

name: Fate of Dynasty
description: A short lore exploration puzzle game inspired by walking simulators such as Gone Home, Dear Esther, and Layers of Fear.

name: Puzzle Guys
description: Puzzle Guys is an adventure puzzle game in which you have to control 4 characters at once.

name: Armored Xpress
description: Armored Xpress is a new unique story-driven Match 3 game built with rich RPG elements and an ATB battle system.

name: Collapse: A Political Simulator
description: Collapse: A Political Simulator is a grand strategy game that takes place in 1992-2004. You take lead of your own Party in the face of the total devastation of one of the fictional post-Soviet states in Europe. Try to realize your (or someone else's) political dreams in the shaky arena of this dilapidated situation.

name: Project Terminus VR
description: TERMINUS is a survival horror VR set in the city of Paris. As you explore the sinking city of Paris, you will come across dangers, allies, and mysteries. You will face the assimilated, the terrifying swarms of nanites, and even worse than that. Playable in solo, coop and cross-platform.

name: The Last Town: Excape
description: The Last Town Is a first person shooter, tower defense, strategy, survival in one of the independent game.Using equipment to resist the corpses, more than 20 guns, accessories, consumables, mountable defenses were designed for the game, and a real physics engine was used to simulate reality

name: A.V.I
description: Explore the halls of a decrepit mansion and discover it's horrifying secrets from the lens of a missing man's smartphone, revealing his fate and the fate of the family that populated this ominous manor.

name: Corners
description: A logic game for two or four players. The goal is to get all the balls home faster than other players. Play with friends or with a computer opponent.

name: Car Drive
description: Car Drive is a game where you need to get to the finish line by transport.

name: Castle of Collapse
description: Just go up, don't look down, and take down the enemies. You will be addicted to this platform game that will challenge you to the fullest.

name: Clutter 1000
description: The greatest Clutter yet! Clutter 1000 is the most exciting Un-Hidden Object game you will ever play. The object of the game? It's simple: click on two matching objects to remove them from the playfield. Along with your old favorites there are twice as many new variations, for days of fun!

name: Black Blade
description: A story about main character lose his love and started the journey of revenge, after many difficult challenges he finally made it, but he will find revenge is not the answer.

name: Evector: Acid Thirst
description: EVECTOR is a fast-paced arcade FPS shooter with run-and-shoot action, intense battles with short respawn times, and checkpoint based progress (no more save/load cheating). If you're looking for a classic FPS game experience, then try this one!

name: Freed Soft
description: Freed Soft is an it company simulator. You have to build your own IT Empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best SOFTWARE in the game world.

name: Space Architect
description: Space station building game. Survive, expand, prosper, and become a major hub!

name: Block'Em!
description: Block'Em! is a multiplayer PvP puzzle-platformer for 2-4 players. Controls are simple but the road to victory is complex: be the first to reach the goal or the last one standing to claim the victory!

name: The Brew Barons
description: A tranquil world becomes ever more corrupt by the day, spoiled by a pirate organization that forcefully impose their brewing monopoly over the lands. It's up to you to explore, forage, craft, sell and deliver your brews to overthrow the corrupt pirate organization and restore peace.

name: Master Blaster VR
description: Master Blater VR brings the thrill of cricket to Virtual Reality in an Arcade mode, bringing fast paced action to your living room. Using a challenging gameplay mode and an intelligent AI system Master Blaster VR is a cricket expereince meant to be enjoyed by fans of the sport of all ages.

name: The Outbreak Story
description: Join Noah as he follows in his deceased father's footsteps: becoming an agent of the Special Paranormal Defense Forces, a secret organisation that protects people from the paranormal. The organisation has its hands full, however, as a strange disease turns people into monsters.

name: Space Station 14
description: Disasters, enemies, and incompetence conspire to make each shift aboard the station a unique and hellish experience. Sign up today to explore intricate game mechanics and enjoy limitless player interaction! (Nanotrasen Inc. is not responsible for injury, death, or worse).

name: Alien Cat 8
description: A brave cat arrived on a planet and faced an unusual gravity that allowed for climbing vertical walls and jumping over abysses on ceilings. But that’s not that easy in fact.

name: Rogue Card
description: Rogue Card is a roguelike deck builder, where every run is unique and strategy matters. Set in a randomized fantasy world, where tactical decisions affect the outcome of your whole game.

name: Monster Tribe
description: Explore an island filled with collectible creatures, a vast and varied wilderness, and dangerous towers on your way to restoring harmony with the land of Akama.

name: Fish Glutton
description: Indie Underwater Level Arcade Game

name: Before Dark
description: With a short battery life and no jumping, how can you survive this world of darkness and bring it back to life? In this platformer, precision and patience are crucial to survival.

name: Jurassic Fantasy
description: Follow a young wizard in his path to find the Magical Stones and himself in this Jurassic Fantasy!

name: Risu
description: Risu is a story-driven, survival horror adventure game. Her new home hides a dark secret; Risu Ishikawa must traverse, solve, and survive a hellish architectural-maze of endless personal nightmares, but what lies at the center?

name: Demon Zombie Outpost
description: Demon Zombie Outpost is a 60 + zombie kills 1 level game.

name: Herder
description: Defend your flock of sheep and goats as your traverse colorful procedural alpine meadows in the sky.

name: Where's My Phone?!
description: Where's My Phone?! is a casual, life-simulation game. Run around your house cleaning, getting ready for work, or decorating for your anniversary.

name: Connected Towers
description: Connected Towers is a puzzle game where you play as a robot that needs to connect towers to activate fences, platforms, and much more.

name: Wordle 3
description: Wordle 3 is the ultimate word game with more challenges, power-ups, and levels than ever before. Improve your vocabulary and spelling skills while having fun with an addictive and educational word puzzle adventure.

name: Minforiga
description: Minesweeper with a character! Dig down to the center of the earth and mend the core crystal before it's too late.

name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story
description: Hauma is an episodic noir interactive graphic novel centered around the exploits of former detective Judith, her fixation on an old murder investigation, and how this unravels conspiracies within the upper echelons of society.

name: Tootinis
description: Tootins is an action packed puzzle adventure game in full 3D filled with original monsters, music and gameplay. Use your bubble spitting powers to smash or push monsters, solve puzzles and save your village. The gameplay is an original mix of action and puzzle elements.

name: Flying Girls
description: "Flying Girls" is a horizontal shooting game with classical Chinese ink painting style.

name: Offroad Mechanic Simulator
description: Service off-road vehicles and take them for a drive! Offroad Mechanic Simulator lets you modify many classic off-road vehicles and prepare them for daunting tasks that no normal car could ever hope to complete. Test your work and climb steep cliffs or drive through rivers and deep layers of mud.

name: Late Stage Inferno
description: Hunt down those responsible for destroying your home. Sneak through ships and kill everyone on board. Climb the ranks until you find reach the top, then take it out. Play out the short story of this alien stuck in a capitalist hell as they take on 8 unique ships.

name: Demelia's Isle
description: You just woke up on a beach. Simply trying to survive, you find yourself immersed in a quest against the demonic forces that are awakening again in this isolated kingdom.

name: Timmy's Nightmare
description: Timmy's Nightmare is an Action-Rogue-Lite taking place in a nightmarishly dark realm, where it's Timmy versus the Lil Terrors, in an all-out brawl for survival as you hunt for his most priced toy, the stuffed bear. All while being the same size as a Baseball. Will you survive?

name: Wind from City
description: This is an anime visual novel that tells the story of human beings wandering to a survivable planet with 42% oxygen content after the destruction of the earth. Human beings cultivated through genes have developed 2800 years later.

name: The Steps as We Know Them
description: Use the moves of chess to solve puzzles. Find your way with six different pieces, through six different worlds. Use a varying way of thinking in each world.

name: AutoLand
description: You are a little robot moving and jumping through levels searching for the teleport. This is an one-button game with awesome pixel art and an impressive soundtrack.

name: Spirit Clash
description: Blockchain card game on the Enjin platform. Do you have what it takes?

name: The Hilltop Mansion
description: Can you escape from this cursed mansion? Rely on the clues left by the ancestors to break the curse of the mansion and survive through it!

name: Hyperspace: Andy's Adventure
description: Hyperspace: Andy’s Adventure is a single player space adventure that anyone who can rely on their reflexes can play. Now, sit back, put on your headphones and get ready for the challenge!

name: Moki
description: Moki is a precision platformer with psychological elements, a story of a little guy lost in your own mind, do you be able to leave this mindness prison?

name: Swordsman VR
description: Swordsman is a story-driven, physics-based medieval combat game designed for virtual reality.

name: Vaporwave
description: A calm and empty place, slow and relaxing music, a very special feeling of nostalgia for a version of the 90s that you have not known ... Welcome to the world of Vaporwave!

name: Spirit Land
description: SPIRIT LAND Possesses special features of a top RPG Southeast Asia. PLAY NOW! The Leader Of Endless Battles & Becoming The Legend In Our Story

name: Uberlaufer
description: You are a German solider in 1940 who opposed the Third Reich. Incarcerated by the SS, you must escape the procedurally-generated dungeon with the assistance of the German resistance using environmental clues to avoid detection by guards. Every playthrough is different.

name: Omega Blade
description: Shoot, slash, dodge and survive to blade combats in multiple kind of challenges to test your skills and claim your place in the Omega Blade hall of fame.

name: Tornado Driver
description: Endless runner game with different environments and objects being randomly generated.

name: Niconotes the Whoo!
description: Help the magical musical NicoNotes fly back into their nests!

name: Planetary Control!
description: Invade strange worlds with alien armies! populate and shield your planets! Assassinate, Sabotage and Nuke your opponents! Collect victory points and achieve... PLANETARY CONTROL!

name: Devil's Dream
description: In Devils's Dream you play as James, a student which want to examine an abandoned place. He and his girlfriend Sophie drove in the late of the Night to the place and get what they hadn't expected. Try to Survive Night. and dont forgot you cannot hide or run from him.

name: Guns N Stuff
description: A top down shared screen local multiplayer game allowing for battles between you and your friends as well as co-op game play against waves of endless zombies.

name: Fimbul Winter
description: FimbulWinter is a first-person horror game in a scandinavian style. The game revolves around a hermit who just try to survive.

name: 大唐西域记
description: Sin descripción

name: Arc Wizards 2
description: The war of the wizards begins! This is a shooting action game!

name: Elmarion: The Lost Temple
description: “Elmarion: the Lost Temple” is a first-person party RPG. The player plays in a squad of 4 adventurers, choosing from 8 different classes. During the game, the squad explores the dungeons, clears them of monsters, and solves puzzles. Purpose of the game: to get an ancient powerful artifact.

name: PitBots
description: Physics based combat game where you design a robot and fight in the arena. Crush, flip, pierce, burn and cut your opponents till the last part. Create superior fighting machines and dominate the arena.

name: Head Worms
description: Fear and anxiety ravage your mind in Head Worms, a survival horror filled with perpetual terror and disorienting challenges.

name: Woebegone Woods
description: Woebegone Woods is a casual worker placement game with a focus on relationship building. Enter the Woebegone Woods, a small, warm village in the middle of a cold and remote forest!

name: The Beast of Stormy Forest
description: Time travel to the past as Detective Cobie Cromwell. Find clues and solve puzzles in this story rich, immersive, virtual reality escape room game. Game to be released in successive chapters, with four total planned.

name: Nummels
description: Nummels are dumb but predictable little guys. They’ll always interact with what’s in front of them, even if it’s a chewed up piece of gum. So toss them a ladder, dig a path, place a bridge, or blast a wall. Get them home safely in this medium skill platformer. Use your brain, they won’t use theirs!

name: Orion: The Eternal Punishment
description: Orion is a frantic first person shooter where you fight the void creatures in mysterious planets and advance using your special abilities and gadgets.

name: Block Machine
description: A difficult programming puzzle game about building parallel computing machines by placing blocks to solve surprisingly hard problems.

name: ZombiesWaves
description: Your friend is blocked! Eliminate the zombies - Open all the doors - Help your friend.

name: Fusion Relics
description: Fusion Relics: A 2D side-scrolling, creature collector, RPG platformer with arcade hack and slash mechanics, hand drawn art, and character customization, where you battle giant titans, hatch unique creatures, and restore the balance between Light and Dark to a corrupted world!

name: Death Roads: Tournament
description: Combine deadly racing, deckbuilding, and roguelite style to get car battles unlike anything before! Choose a driver, car, weapons, and sponsors to overcome tactical encounters. Adapt to an ever-changing race to come out on top and earn entry into the last safe haven on the Divided States of America.

name: Map Game: Or Something
description: An action platformer game that involves drawing maps and playing through cool and epic levels with really cool and awesome and creative design.

name: Crusader Kings II: Jade Dragon
description: Crusader Kings II: Jade Dragon allows you to interact with China for protection and technological marvels -- and possibly face their wrath in the form of rebels or full-scale invasions. New gameplay features including a new Tributary system, Chinese Mercenaries, and much more will make the Transoxiana and India regions come alive with...

name: Hana's Campus Life!
description: What does one do when a girl appears, claiming to be a god? For college student Jeong Lee-Han, his life suddenly becomes turned upside down by the appearance of the god, Hana. A supernatural love comedy visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Anti-Science Brigade
description: 15-year-old Avani is tricked into starting an anti-science mob to pay off her mother's medical debts. Use classic turn-based tactics to convince the town to join your cause. It's silly. It's sad. It's scary. It's the Anti-Science Brigade. 50% of profits go to National Center for Science Education.

name: Witch and Spirit
description: Play Hide and Seek in the Mistery Land with friends in Compete Mode or Collaborate Mode.

name: Dirty Cop Simulator
description: The life of a young cop, meaning parking tickets, checking speeds, vandals and petty thieves, can bore anyone. Can you resist the temptation or will you go down the path full of money and adrenaline?

name: I am Dictator
description: Become dictator of the only country that does not yield to the world's superpowers. Use your skills to build an army, care for your people, provide wealth and gain worldwide respect. You're a natural-born leader and the best diplomat. We await your orders, Sir!

name: Break It Down
description: Advanced Destruction Physics | Everything is Destructible

name: Smart Moves 2
description: "Smart Moves 2" is a pixel-art puzzle game with turn-based combat mechanics. Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you. Smart moves are the key to survival!

name: Gurobu
description: "GUROBU" is a story-driven, 2D horror game about haunted apartments, ghosts of the past, and a murder mystery.

name: Vorlaw: Space Opera
description: Vorlaw is our world. Vorlaw is perfection. Vorlaw is order. Vorlaw can't tolerate your poisonous deviant mind. Run away and fight for freedom. No matter how.

name: Carom Billiards
description: Carom Billiards is the most realistic and closest to reality French billiards simulation

name: XXZ: XXL
description: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. Day Z caught you in one of the biggest strip clubs in Las Vegas. You are gathering a group of three people in order to escape the city.

name: Pandemic Train
description: In Pandemic Train you are in charge of the crew aboard a train roaming the postapocalyptic wasteland, ravaged by both war and a deadly plague. Your goal is to survive long enough to discover the cure… or die trying. Humanity’s fate is in your hands! Start your journey now!

name: Sudoku Dreams
description: Simple Experiment game of Sudoku.

name: Down in the Dark
description: The world has been plunged into a darkness of chaos and violence. The streets of the city are teeming with ruthless rapists and murderers. Get ready for frantic battles, wild chases, puzzles, upgrades and discover new characters in each chapter of this action-packed detective story.

name: uVolley
description: A new vision of the volleyball video game developed by a volleyball player, play a match or league in single player mode, two players or multiplayer, wear your visor and you are in the game...

name: Fortoresse
description: Fortoresse is a 2D team-based pvp warfare game in the simplest but most efficient fashion! Shoot and conjure blocks at your advantage to lead your team to victory!

name: Close Contact
description: Close Contact is a short, narrative-driven, sci-fi horror game where you must navigate an advanced underground base whilst avoiding the alien creature that stalks you.

name: Pirate Simulator
description: Start a rebellious career as a poor sailor and climb your way up to become the richest and the most dangerous captain of the archipelago. Take over sea routes, set up hideouts, build fleets and fight enemy crews to lead a legendary pirate life!

name: Cions of Vega
description: Your daughter Leila ran away from home, so you're going after her to find where she's hiding. Your brother, Logan, accompanies you throughout your journey.

name: Throw It
description: Throw It is a simple multiplayer game where you have to sort the boxes with your teammate and get as much money collected before time runs out.

name: The Far Kingdoms: Forgotten Relics
description: In this Solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics - play 150 Solitaire and Hidden Object levels!

name: Solargene
description: Build and manage colonies on the surfaces of planets and satellites, as well as space stations. With realistic physics of orbital flights.

name: The Sole Survivor
description: If You Survive So Your A SOLE SURVIVOR,

name: Crossing Dungeon
description: Game operation1、The keyboard direction keys control the character movement. 2、 You can also walk by clicking on the map with the mouse. 3、 The third-person perspective such as villages, towns, dungeons, Q and E keys control steering.

name: Traffic V
description: Traffic V - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go. One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: ProjectTeo
description: ProjectTeo is a platformer with moving between dangerous saws and collecting keys.

name: Shadow Walls
description: Kill a variety of enemies with your pistol or swing your bat. Collect letters while you trying to find your sister in dark atmospheric action top-down shooter 2D game.

name: The Dragon Sword
description: 明朝末年，朝政腐敗，魏忠賢獨攬大權，大肆誅殺異己，前錦衣衛指揮使聶玉弓因不忍枉殺忠良，得罪了奸臣魏忠賢，遭其陷害以致家破人亡。抗金名將袁崇煥上奏摺稱頌魏忠賢的功德，相反魏忠賢派使其黨羽以袁崇煥不救錦州為由，彈劾袁崇煥，從此揭開了一場鬥智鬥力的曲折開端……

name: Perennial Order
description: Perennial Order is an atmospheric One-Hit-Death Boss Rush, set in a verdant Dark Age world. Explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or with a friend. Slay nature-infested horrors, creatures, and titans, all in a painterly 2D style.

name: Floathink
description: Floathink is an action puzzle game with physics and gravity, which objective is to reach the platform of each level with your spaceship as soon as you can, by avoiding several space obstacles.

name: Encycle
description: A slightly hallucinogenic puzzle platformer.

name: Smart Fart
description: Smart Fart is a silly strategy game about a warehouse worker who ate too many beans. Your resource is your main enemy, so spend it wisely !

name: SuperTanks
description: Battle against friends using tanks and their weapons. Find bonuses on map and use them to your adventage. All tanks can use bullets, lasers, bombs, temporary speed or special sphere where bullets are slower. Game can be streamed on Twitch and other streaming platforms.
